You sow seeds of confusion in your target’s mind, causing their actions and thoughts to become clumsy.
Hurl sonic taunts to hurt creatures.
Strengthen allies' attacks in an aura around you.
Make a trail behind a creature.
Release a small cone of flame from your mouth.
You hurl a bolt of saltwater from your extended hand.
You release a quick burst of wind that batters your living opponents without causing them lasting harm, while also blowing undead away.
Create bubbles that make a creature buoyant.
You alter your stomach, esophagus, and tongue to be able to spit partially digested food with force.
A floating platform follows you, carrying objects.
You intervene in a heated disagreement between two creatures, encouraging them to put aside their differences and find some common ground.
A creature becomes more friendly to you.
Icy shards fly out from you in a cone.
Make food and drink safe and delicious.
Bid a creature approach, run, drop something, lie prone, or stand up.
Damage foes with music.
Charge a metal weapon with electricity.
Conjure 2 gallons of water.
An understanding of how violence begets more violence fills your target, causing it mental anguish
Make creatures parched, damaging and enfeebling them.
See auras of a chosen alignment.
Determine whether an object or creature is poisonous or venomous.
Mask the aura of a spell or item.
Swirling colors blind, dazzle, or stun creatures.
Mentally sting a creature's mind to make it less capable of attacking creatures other than you.
Make a creature do the same thing repeatedly.
Your attacks build up to release a sonic pulse.
You overwhelm the target with an unexpected and unpredictable desire if it fails a Will save.
You invigorate the touched creature’s mind and urge it to press on.
Sap a creature's strength.
Trade appearances with the target.
The target's clothes are transformed into ostentatious attire that epitomizes high-end local fashion.
You speak about the consequences of actions people take against each other
Frighten a creature, possibly making it flee.
You create a puff of colorful smoke that quickly disperses while you become temporarily invisible.
Make your Speed much faster.
With a touch, you strip off the flesh, muscle, and internal organs off your target, leaving only bare bones.
Grow a patch of cacti, flowers, fruits, or roots to hurt your enemies.
Bend a metal object into a ball.
Giving a cheerful whistle, you call forth a handful of small animals, such as birds or mice, to collect food for you and your allies.
Pelt creatures with unerring shards of magical force.
You soften the target's blows, ensuring they avoid vital areas and cause no lasting harm.
Developed before the introduction of the Iron Lagoon, this cantrip for superheating metal has also found valuable combat use.
You shoot out ephemeral, telekinetic strands that drag each target directly toward you, stopping in the closest unoccupied space to you in this path.
React to save a falling creature.
Your movements leave a vague glowing path behind you, like a misty echo of your presence.
Infect a creature with goblin pox.
Pull one or more creatures towards you using gravity.
Cover a target or an area with slippery grease.
Creatures in a line take void damage and start to bleed.
You exhale desiccating grit and sand in a small cloud.
Wind blows out fires and knocks back objects and creatures.
Void energy harms the living or heals the undead, either a single creature or all in a burst.
Vital energy heals the living or harms the undead, either a single creature or all in a burst.
You call forth a ladder or staircase to help you reach greater heights.
You temporarily shape your lower limbs into the tail of a hippocampus in order to swim away from a nearby foe after dealing a parting blow.
Gather energy and throw a ball of lightning.
Damage and push a creature with a blast of water.
Curse a creature with misfortune.
Make yourself look like a different creature.
Form a convincing illusion of an object.
Put a false psychic imprint in an object.
Empower attacks with vital energy to damage the undead.
A spray of viscous, toxic ink jets from your fingertip to strike a target creature in the face.
Create earthenware objects.
React to make a barrier of earth.
Make an item disappear.
Disguise an item to look perfect or shoddy.
Make an impressive leap.
Turn your companion into its juvenile form.
Use waves of force to push enemies back

You create an invisible anchor at a location within range (even if it's outside your line of sight or line of effect), as long as you can identify the location by its appearance (or other identifying features).
Make creatures heavy and weak to electricity.
You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place.
Make a lock much harder to open.
React to impede and possibly divert a Stride.
Make ordinary stones into magical sling bullets that are especially dangerous to undead.
Repair one non-magical item.
You record a message up to 5 minutes long and inscribe a special rune on any flat unattended surface within reach.
Mentally impart 10 minutes worth of information in an instant.
Conjure mud to slow movement.
Ward yourself with magical armor.
Heal your undead minion and protect it from positive energy.
Suppress a creature’s scent.
Thorns sprout from your body; they pass through and don't damage any clothing or armor you wear.
Form a toxic cloud that poisons and sickens.
Cheat at gambling.
Get psychic impressions from an object.
You make a grand spectacle out of getting hit.
You envelop the target in a shroud of shadow.
You conjure a 5-foot-wide rain cloud that follows the target wherever it goes.
Turn into a nonthreatening animal.
Hide a familiar or animal companion in a pocket dimension.
Create a creature of force to perform minor tasks.
Cause a creature ongoing pain that sickens it.
Withdraw books from a pocket library for study.
Raise a creature's AC.
Conjure a tree that guards allies.
Hurl a cone of rocks to batter creatures.
You evoke life essence into the form of water and freeze it, then launch the icicle at a foe.
You cause otherwise edible food to rot and spoil instantly, and water and other liquids to become brackish and undrinkable.
Automatically sort many objects.
Make permanent style changes to clothing.
Temporarily apply magical runes to a creature's unarmed attacks.
Temporarily apply magical runes to a weapon.
You call out to the creatures of the wild favored by your deity.
Protect a creature from being attacked.
Distract foes with their exultation at your failure.
You evoke a mass of fire into the air around your outstretched fist.
You blast the area with grit that scours away soil and gets into creatures’ eyes.
Copy a sound in a magical seashell.
You share your knowledge with the touched creatures.
A large gem floats around the target in an erratic pattern.
Reinforce a creature’s arm with metal that lets it use its arm as a shield.
Make a club or staff temporarily magical, and deal more damage to unnatural creatures.
You create a wave of energy that ripples through the earth.
Send an exploding firework straight up into the sky.
Put creatures in a small area to sleep.
You throw a magically propelled and chilled ball of dense snow.
Heal the target and bolster them against mental attacks.
Damage a creature and afflict it with spider venom.
Continually transfer your health to someone else.
Conjure an animal to fight for you.
Conjure a construct to fight on your behalf.
Conjure a fey to fight on your behalf.
Summon a minor celestial, monitor, or fiend.
Conjure a plant or fungus to fight on your behalf.
Conjure an undead to fight on your behalf.
Your next attack is especially accurate.
You call upon the spirits of the soil to twist and churn, transforming the terrain in the targeted area into a sodden mess.
Place sigils on your targets that flash at a prespecified time.
You link the minds of two targets, enabling them to move in tandem.
Increase your speed for an hour.
You conjure a temporary simple tool, such as a shovel or rope into your hands.
You use magical chains, vines, or other tethers to bind your target to you.
Illusory copies of your weapon arm improve your ability to feint.
Teleport an item to an ally’s grasp.
Call down a thunderbolt.
Obscure your tracks.
Throw your voice.
Make a plant seed grow rapidly.
Upon casting, the target emits a musk that's captivating to certain animals.
Create a wall of shrubs that provide cover.
Reduce the durability of something made of earth.
Break plant fiber into strands and magically weave them.
Turn your hands into tree trunks.
Move and harm foes with a hand of acid.
Your touch afflicts the target with an advanced form of scurvy, a mariner's disease stemming from improper nutrition.
You create a spectral albatross, a guiding bird for sailors, to hover around the target.
You transform one object into an edible substance that any living creature can chew, swallow, and safely digest.
Turn into a dangerous animal.
Send a Tiny animal to deliver a message.
Temporarily animate small objects to attack.
You implant a mental mine within your psyche that detonates against anyone attempting to manipulate your thoughts.
Summon a cloud of hot ash and smoke.
Predict whether a course of action brings good fortune.
Make clothes fit the occasion.
A shimmering muzzle of pure magical force clamps the target's mouth shut.
You create a churning eddy of warm air that makes it difficult to fly within the area.
